remarks: Condition for parallel product when the first argument is not an ordered pair.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-May-2014.)
statement:
brpprod3.1 $e |- X e. _V $.
brpprod3.2 $e |- Y e. _V $.
brpprod3.3 $e |- Z e. _V $.
brpprod3b $p |- ( X pprod ( R , S ) <. Y , Z >. <-> E. z E. w ( X = <. z , w >. /\ z R Y /\ w S Z ) ) $.
$d R w z $.
$d S w z $.
$d X w z $.
$d Y w z $.
$d Z w z $.
